lowroadandhigh.name: The Low Road and the High
lowroadandhigh.flavor: The cratered viaduct of the High Road runs on crumbling pylons of dying dryland coral across the pallid grasses. Beneath the half-passable testament to the follies of the Long-Long-Ago, the Low Road winds, smeared threads of soil and loam and oil and blood ground into a hard surface by the pounding feet, hooves, wheels, and treads of pilgrims, nomads, caravans, and vechs.

connections.description: Harsh lands, forbidding to travelers, dotted with odd remnants of the 'Best-Forgotten' ages.

harmonium.name: Harmonium
harmonium.flavor: ONLY PERFECT AND CONSTANT APPLICATION OF THE HARMONY CAN KEEP THE DREAMER/ORACLE/HEIR ASLEEP
harmonium.description: A world of platonic planes, fragile metalworks and resonant glass. The Bell of Slumber awaits high above, and the Bell of Awakening lurks deep below. Stop the Bell of Slumber and ring the Bell of Awakening, and the Dreamer shall awaken once more.
